org.sakaiproject.user.api

Class UserPermissionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.sakaiproject.user.api.UserPermissionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class UserPermissionException
extends Exception

    UserPermissionException is thrown when an attempt is made to perform a user operation that the end-user does not have permission for.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
